drills.name: Cradling
drills.description: Try to bring as many shots as possible into a cradle before shooting.

drills.name: Shielding
drills.description: Pay special attention to shielding while the ball is out of control.

drills.name: Micro Flips/Stern Catch/Ostermeier
drills.description: Find the micro flip timing on this machine and use it as much as possible, along with Stern Catch and Ostermeier.

drills.name: Post Pass
drills.description: Determine if post pass is possible on this machine and use it to set up specific shots.

drills.name: Ski Pass
drills.description: Determine if ski pass is possible on this machine and see which returns allow for it.

drills.name: Dead Bounce
drills.description: Flip less and focus on dead bounces to set up shots.

drills.name: Drop Catch
drills.description: Drop catch as much as possible to determine the proper timing on this machine for normal/delayed catch. Rememeber the timing is later on older machines.

drills.name: Slap Save
drills.description: Play a little riskier and go for slap saves to save center drains. Are single or double slaps better?

drills.name: Shatzing
drills.description: Test whether shatzing is possible on this machine, and use it to pass the ball or save balls close to the flippers.

drills.name: Nudging
drills.description: Nudge on almst all bounces, notice which feeds/slings/outlanes respond well to nudging.

drills.name: Orbits Loop Pass
drills.description: Shoot orbits and see if nudges are required, or if loop passes are possible.

reminders: Visualize how you want the game to go.
Missed shots happen, recover and get the next one.
Don't hold up the flipper too long!
Acknowledge stray thoughts and let them go.
